function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of clarity around what constitutes acceptable reasons for absence may lead to employees with contagious diseases coming to work.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within the workplace, potential outbreak, and increased employee absenteeism due to illness.","Mitigation":"Clear and specific communication of acceptable reasons for absence, provision of remote work options, and strict adherence to public health guidelines.","Technologies":"Communication platforms for policy dissemination, remote work technology, and health monitoring tools.","People":"All employees, managers, and HR personnel.","Owner":"Human Resources, management, and health and safety personnel."},{"Description":"Lack of clear guidance on non-essential travel may result in employees traveling to high-risk areas and bringing contagious diseases back to the workplace.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread within the workplace, potential exposure of coworkers, and potential disruption of business operations due to employee illness or quarantine.","Mitigation":"Strict definition of essential travel, adherence to health protection agency guidelines, and implementation of return-to-work protocols for employees visiting high-risk locations.","Technologies":"Travel tracking software, communication platforms for travel policy dissemination, and health monitoring tools.","People":"Employees, travel coordinators, and management.","Owner":"HR, travel coordinators, and management."}]}
